bibl.title: Preliminary Report on the Seventh Italian Archaeological Mission - Temple of Amenhotep II at Western Thebes - Winter 2004/2005. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: See p. 221 and pll. XX-XXXII A: 3 nice jars, dating to the Ptolemaic or even Roman epoch. In the biggest jar, 3 pairs of leather shoes were found. The jars are probably connected with a burial place.
bibl.seg: SESANA Angelo, Preliminary Report on the Seventh Italian Archaeological Mission - Temple of Amenhotep II at Western Thebes - Winter 2004/2005. Avec résumé en anglais.
See p. 221 and pll. XX-XXXII A: 3 nice jars, dating to the Ptolemaic or even Roman epoch. In the biggest jar, 3 pairs of leather shoes were found. The jars are probably connected with a burial place.
